name: A Dicey Demise
description:
A Game about dices! 

A Dicey Demise is a clicker/"gambling" game made during the GMTK Game Jam 2022 by 2 rather new Unity devs - The Horse Bros (;

The game consists of 2 modes. The Dice Attack mode and the Dice Tosser mode. 

In Dice Attack you must prevent a buttload of randomized, flying dices from falling on the ground. If you fail to do so you will lose health and obviously die. If you manage to click on the dice however you will gain score and send those pesky cubes with dots straight to hell! How much score you gain per click is randomized. The theme is Roll of a Dice, after all (; More dice spawn over time. I dare you to get a high score higher than 500  ; D

In Dice Tosser you can bet on a number from 1 to 6 and if that number shows on the dice you win:  absolutely nothing. You can also adjust the strength with which the dice gets thrown.

Sounds by: us, dersuperanton, Leszek_Szary, Dieter van der Westen. 

Dice Model by:  Armor and Rum
Game made by The Horse Bros!
